title: My Pixel4 won't allow me to use Face ID to open my BofA bank account? Are they not compatible?
content: I can not figure out how to make the BofA app use FaceID and now there is no finger print reader, so I'm being forced to key my password every time I want to open my bank account.   Honestly, if this isn't fixed, I'm going to have to return this phone and go back to Pixel3 or iPhone.
